columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the behavior
columns.Name: BehaviorId

columns.Description: Type of behavior
columns.Name: ActionType

columns.Description: Type of threat indicator or breach activity identified by the behavior
columns.Name: Categories

columns.Description: Product or service that identified the behavior
columns.Name: ServiceSource

columns.Description: Detection technology or sensor that identified the notable component or activity
columns.Name: DetectionSource

columns.Description: Products or services that provided information for the behavior
columns.Name: DataSources

columns.Description: Type of object, such as a file, a process, a device, or a user
columns.Name: EntityType

columns.Description: Indicates whether the entity is impacted or merely related
columns.Name: EntityRole

columns.Description: The role of the entity in the behavior
columns.Name: DetailedEntityRole

columns.Description: Name of the file that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: FileName

columns.Description: Folder containing the file that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: FolderPath

columns.Description: SHA-1 hash of the file that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: SHA1

columns.Description: SHA-256 of the file that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: SHA256

columns.Description: Size of the file in bytes
columns.Name: FileSize

columns.Description: Malware family that the suspicious or malicious file or process has been classified under
columns.Name: ThreatFamily

columns.Description: IP address that was being connected to
columns.Name: RemoteIP

columns.Description: URL or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) that was being connected to
columns.Name: RemoteUrl

columns.Description: User name of the account
columns.Name: AccountName

columns.Description: Domain of the account
columns.Name: AccountDomain

columns.Description: Security Identifier (SID) of the account
columns.Name: AccountSid

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AccountObjectId

columns.Description: User principal name (UPN) of the account
columns.Name: AccountUpn

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in the service
columns.Name: DeviceId

columns.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device
columns.Name: DeviceName

columns.Description: IP address assigned to the local machine used during communication
columns.Name: LocalIP

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the email, generated by Office 365
columns.Name: NetworkMessageId

columns.Description: Subject of the email
columns.Name: EmailSubject

columns.Description: Identifier for the group of similar emails clustered based on heuristic analysis of their contents
columns.Name: EmailClusterId

columns.Description: Application that performed the recorded action
columns.Name: Application

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the application
columns.Name: ApplicationId

columns.Description: Unique identifier of the third-party OAuth application
columns.Name: OAuthApplicationId

columns.Description: Command line used to create the new process
columns.Name: ProcessCommandLine

columns.Description: Registry key that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: RegistryKey

columns.Description: Name of the registry value that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: RegistryValueName

columns.Description: Data of the registry value that the recorded action was applied to
columns.Name: RegistryValueData

columns.Description: Additional information about the behavior
columns.Name: AdditionalFields
